name: Alex Morgan
backgroundStory: You're a freelance writer who specializes in cold cases and unsolved mysteries. After reading about Maya Chen's disappearance in a Boston newspaper and recognizing her name from journalism circles, you've come to Blackwater Bay under the pretense of writing a travel piece about coastal towns. Your real motive is to discover what happened to Maya and potentially uncover the story she was working on.

visualDescription.visibleClothing: Casual but professional attire suitable for a traveling writer

worldKnowledge: Maya Chen disappeared while investigating the Thomas family case
The Thomas family disappeared mysteriously 20 years ago
Blackwater Bay will celebrate its Founder's Day Festival in three days
The town seems protective of its secrets and wary of outsiders

personalNotes.title: Initial Impressions
personalNotes.content: The town has an undeniable charm but feels oddly tense. People clam up when I mention Maya or ask about the town's history. The hotel manager seems nervous but potentially helpful. Need to establish why Maya was interested in the Thomas family disappearance.

personalNotes.title: Room 312
personalNotes.content: Strange that I was assigned the same room where Maya stayed. Coincidence? The room looks recently cleaned, but there are signs that someone searched it thoroughly. Window frame has fresh scratches. Need to inspect more carefully when I have time alone.

skillsAndAbilities.name: Research
skillsAndAbilities.description: Years of investigative writing have made you adept at finding information and connecting seemingly unrelated facts.

skillsAndAbilities.name: Interviewing
skillsAndAbilities.description: You know how to get people talking and can often extract information they didn't intend to share.

skillsAndAbilities.name: Photography
skillsAndAbilities.description: You can document scenes effectively and know how to spot details others might miss.

skillsAndAbilities.name: Lock Picking
skillsAndAbilities.description: A skill acquired from a former source who was an ex-burglar. You're not expert but can handle basic locks with the right tools.
